attributes.action: To hold a referendum before agreeing any terms of the WHO Global Health Treaty
attributes.additional_details:
The WHO have not been elected by UK citizens and have little, if any accountability or liability for their decisions.

The WHO receives millions of pounds in funding from and therefore are influenced by, non-state funders who have made considerable wealth from Covid-2 & have no duty to protect UK citizens.

The WHO removed the words "with enormous numbers of deaths and illness" from their definition of a flu pandemic; any seasonal flu could be classified as a pandemic and trigger their plan.
attributes.background:
Provide opportunities to debate the benefits & consequences of being governed by the WHO.

Hold a referendum to decide if we want to devolve accountability to the WHO, which could accede power to define laws, mandates for medications, lockdowns, restrictions to earn & penalties for non-compliance.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614335
